docs.snippet: To turn kids into elite and healthy athletes, avoid specialization....
docs.lead_paragraph: To turn kids into elite and healthy athletes, avoid specialization.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by reporter David Epstein warns American children are playing sports in too structured a manner too early in life on adult-sized fields and spending too much time in one sport; holds this can lead to serious injuries and a lesser ultimate level of athletic success; calls for urging children to avoid hyperspecialization and to instead sample variety of sport through at least age 12.
